author: CBC News
title: Labatt retools beer production and starts making hand sanitizer instead
description: Labatt Breweries is retooling its beer-making facilities to make 50,000 bottles of hand sanitizer as it joins the global effort to combat COVID-19.
content:
Labatt Breweries is retooling its beer-making facilities to brew up to 50,000 bottles of hand sanitizer as it joins the global effort to combat COVID-19. 
The effort will include facilities in London, Ont., Edmonton, Montreal, Vancouver and the Mill Street B… [+2012 chars]
